channel.title: Getting Started on Econumo
channel.description: Recent content in Getting Started on Econumo

item.title: FAQ
item.description: Frequently Asked Questions # Do you have plans to add automated import of transactions from banks? # Automated import of transactions from banks and other sources is not a priority for me. I prefer to enter transactions manually, as it helps me to be more aware of my expenses. It might be added in the future as an optional feature, but it will not be the main focus of the application.
